product_name: Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: What makes Vans Encore snowboard boots even better? An allover Hello Kitty print! Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots are a fun take on proven performers that will help you carve up the slopes. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. Boa lacing offers on-the-fly adjustment and never comes untied; you get consistent closure without pressure points. TriFit-X thermal liners feature asymmetric X-Cage inserts that lock your heels in place; low-volume soles help you feel connected to the board. Fleece-lined upper cuffs offer warmth; flexible toe boxes help the boots feel more like shoes when you're walking or hiking. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around your ankles and calves. Instep articulation offers a forgiving forward flex that maintains support. Dual-density EVA footbeds feature integrated arch support and dual-density metatarsal and heel impact-relief pads. Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots feature cushioned rubber outsoles with an inverted waffle tread patten for increased traction.
short_description: What makes Vans Encore snowboard boots even better? An allover Hello Kitty print! Vans Encore Hello Kitty Snowboard Boots are a fun take on proven performers that will help you carve up the slopes.
